Dear hiring manager or employee,

I am writing to you in hopes to joining the crew/team. The position requirements and my skills are a perfect match.

I am a very strong, reliable worker for your crew. I try my best to meet the requirements and I never fail. I have exceptional work experience that has honed many skilled within my-self for an individual my age. I have gone to worlds end to show that I have the working spirit.

As you’ll see on my enclosed resume, I have the experience, and track record for which you are searching. In addition, I am motivated and enthusiastic, and would appreciate the opportunity to contribute to your crew success.

I can promise that meeting with me will not be a waste of your time and I will make myself available at your convenience, during or outside of normal business hours.

Sincerely,

Bridget Dominguez
